amendment.description: Amendment sought to extend the redesignation period for HUBZones to 7 years.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 50 printed in House Report 114-639 to extend the redesignation period for HUBZones to 7 years.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Carney amendment (A040) Failed by recorded vote: 131 - 292 (Roll no. 393).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Carney amendment (A040) Failed by recorded vote: 131 - 292 (Roll no. 393).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A040) offered by Mr. Carney.
